projects.title: Wordle Recreation
projects.bodyText:
- A recreation of the New York Times web game Wordle using Unity 
- Recreated to gain more familiarity and confidence using Unity 2D

projects.title: Budget Buddy
projects.bodyText:
- First Unity project 
- Game developed for Fall 2023 eLearning and Gamification class 
- 2D game developed with the intention of teaching teenagers and young adults the important skill of grocery budgeting

projects.title: Chef In Training App
projects.bodyText:
- A database group project designed to help users keep an organized portfolio of recipes 
- Allows the user to create new recipes, sort though existing recipes, add pictures, difficulty level, appliences used, ingredients used, as well as  other search functions 
- Created for Fall 2023 Files and Database class

projects.title: 8 Puzzle Solver
projects.bodyText:
- Partner project for Fall 2022 Algorithms class 
- A program where the user chooses a playable 8 puzzle board for the computer to solve 
-Using a swapping method to move up, down, left, and right the computer will print every move made and the number of moves needed to solve the puzzle 
-Max moves are capped at 35
